attributes.action: Team Gb should be reanamed to Team uk for 2012..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Team Gb should be reanamed to Team uk for the olympics in 2012, events should take place all over the UK . 
At present Wales and Scotland, evan though they have Team memebers there represcitive contries are not shown .
In china , the games were held all over the contry , here you have to be with in 2 hrs of the main area. Surely our country is so small that leaving whole area's out is a snub from englnd to Wales and Scotland

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
